Package org.gephi.utils

Class Summary
CharsetToolkit Utility class to guess the encoding of a given text file.
HTMLEscape Class for escaping html of a String to show it in a hrml report without problems
PaletteUtils  
PaletteUtils.Palette  
StatisticsUtils Class with some statistics methods for calculating values such as the average, median, sum, max and min of a list of numbers.
TableCSVExporter  
TempDirUtils  
TempDirUtils.TempDir  
TimeIntervalGraphics Class to draw time intervals as graphics, being able to indicate the colors to use (or default colors).
